option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import com.jfoenix.controls.JFXButton?> <?import com.jfoenix.controls.JFXComboBox?> <?import javafx.collections.FXCollections?> <?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.*?> <?import java.lang.String?> <AnchorPane prefHeight="700.0" prefWidth="1200.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/23.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="controller.AddproductinterfaceController">
<!-- Image Preview Box --> <ImageView fx:id="productImage" fitHeight="100.0" fitWidth="100.0" layoutX="230.0" layoutY="90.0" style="-fx-border-color: black;"/>
<!-- Choose Image Button --> <Button fx:id="handleChooseImage1" layoutX="832.0" layoutY="182.0" onAction="#handleChooseImage" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0" text="Choose Image"> <font> <Font size="16.0"/> </font> </Button> <ChoiceBox fx:id="categoryChoiceBox" layoutX="832.0" layoutY="369.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0"> <items> <FXCollections fx:factory="observableArrayList"> <String fx:value="Men"/> <String fx:value="Women"/> <String fx:value="Kids"/> </FXCollections> </items> </ChoiceBox> <Label alignment="CENTER" contentDisplay="CENTER" layoutX="200.0" prefHeight="91.0" prefWidth="844.0" text="Add New Customer" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="Book Antiqua Bold" size="51.0"/> </font> </Label> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#404a54" height="104.0" layoutY="-1.0" stroke="#404a54" strokeType="INSIDE" width="1200.0"/> <Label alignment="CENTER" contentDisplay="CENTER" layoutX="178.0" layoutY="14.0" prefHeight="91.0" prefWidth="844.0" text="Add New Item" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="Book Antiqua Bold" size="51.0"/> </font> </Label> <Label layoutX="716.0" layoutY="242.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="90.0" text="ID : "> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <TextField fx:id="txtidAdditem" layoutX="831.0" layoutY="242.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Rounded MT Bold" size="17.0"/> </font> </TextField> <Label layoutX="637.0" layoutY="306.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="162.0" text="Product Title : "> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <TextField fx:id="txtitemname" layoutX="831.0" layoutY="306.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Rounded MT Bold" size="17.0"/> </font> </TextField> <Label layoutX="656.0" layoutY="190.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="162.0" text="Add Image : "> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <Label layoutX="665.0" layoutY="369.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="143.0" text="Category : "> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <Label layoutX="702.0" layoutY="434.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="100.0" text="Size : "> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <TextField fx:id="txtsizeitems" layoutX="832.0" layoutY="434.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Rounded MT Bold" size="17.0"/> </font> </TextField> <Label layoutX="686.0" layoutY="532.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="118.0" text="Price : "> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <TextField fx:id="txtpriceadditems" layoutX="835.0" layoutY="532.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Rounded MT Bold" size="17.0"/> </font> </TextField> <JFXButton layoutX="943.0" layoutY="624.0" onAction="#btnItemAddOnAction" prefHeight="53.0" prefWidth="118.0" style="-fx-background-color: green;" text="Add" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="Bernard MT Condensed" size="20.0"/> </font> </JFXButton> <JFXButton layoutX="665.0" layoutY="624.0" onAction="#btnShowItemsOnAction" prefHeight="40.0" prefWidth="223.0" style="-fx-background-color: #0e70db;" text="Show Items" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font name="Arial Black" size="24.0"/> </font> </JFXButton> <ImageView fitHeight="572.0" fitWidth="572.0" layoutX="41.0" layoutY="115.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../img/4.jpg"/> </image> </ImageView> <Label layoutX="647.0" layoutY="131.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="162.0" text="Supplier ID : "> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <Label layoutX="685.0" layoutY="482.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="132.0" text="QTY :"> <font> <Font name="Anton Regular" size="23.0"/> </font> </Label> <TextField fx:id="txtqtyfield" layoutX="834.0" layoutY="482.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0"> <font> <Font name="Arial Rounded MT Bold" size="17.0"/> </font> </TextField> <JFXComboBox fx:id="cmbSupplierid" layoutX="826.0" layoutY="125.0" prefHeight="37.0" prefWidth="223.0"/>
</AnchorPane>
